keyword: how many calories are in a small apple
title: How Many Calories Are in a Small Apple?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a small apple, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Small Apple?
assumptions: Small apple (~125 g with skin), raw, no added toppings or processing.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by apple variety, size, ripeness, and growing conditions. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A small apple provides ~52 kcal and ~2.4 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a small apple?
faqs.a: About 52 kcal for a small apple (~125 g).

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a small apple?
faqs.a: Approximately 13.8 g carbs, including 2.4 g fiber and 10.4 g sugars.

faqs.q: Does a small apple have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Very little: 0.3 g protein and 0.2 g fat.

faqs.q: How does apple size affect calories?
faqs.a: Small apples (~125 g) have fewer calories than medium (~182 g, ~95 kcal) or large.

faqs.q: Are apples low in sodium and cholesterol?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 1 mg sodium and 0 mg cholesterol per small apple.
